mods.name: Wesleys - 100LuckyStrikeTalent
mods.author: slautomaton
mods.description: This mod modifies the Peerless Lumberjack and Lucky Strike nodes (Survival -> Resources) within the player's talent tree from the original 1% chance to something more substantial. Talen tree rank requirements are halved (requiring half the investment from the base)

mods.name: Wesleys - Balance Overhaul
mods.author: slautomaton
mods.description: Overhaul a number of things to ease on the grind for working adults.

mods.name: Wesleys - InfiniteStamina
mods.author: slautomaton
mods.description: Infinite Stamina for Player and Mounts.

mods.name: Wesleys - Mission Rewards Multiplier x60
mods.author: slautomaton
mods.description: Mission rewards boosted by 60x. Experience awarded boosted by 3x.
